text: @realDonaldTrump Let me guess...it's the day BEFORE the coronavirus vaccine will miraculously be available to the American people. At least that's what you'll say in order to try and get reelected. You are a liar and a con-man Donny, plain and simple. You're also gonna be a ONE TERM president.
